wordGroup: failure diagnosis 故障诊断，失效诊断
prenatal diagnosis 产前诊断，产前检查
business diagnosis 业务分析，企业诊断

sentences.en: They are waiting for the doctor's diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 他们正在等待医生的诊断结论。

sentences.en: An accurate diagnosis was made after a series of tests.
sentences.cn: 准确的诊断是在一系列的检查后作出的。

sentences.en: Early diagnosis and treatment can usually prevent blindness.
sentences.cn: 早期诊断和治疗通常可以防止失明。
